tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Target_Organizations (
    Organization_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Organization_Name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    Structure_Description TEXT,
    Processes_Description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ExploitationData (
    exploitation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    exploit_type VARCHAR(50),
    exploit_date DATE,
    exploit_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES TargetOrganizations(organization_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TargetOrganizations (
    organization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_name VARCHAR(255),
    organization_type VARCHAR(100),
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    revenue DECIMAL,
    employee_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE SocialEngineeringData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id UUID REFERENCES TargetOrganizations(organization_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    last_interaction_date DATE,
    sensitive_info TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExploitationPlans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id UUID REFERENCES TargetOrganizations(organization_id),
    plan_description TEXT,
    target_date DATE,
    action_steps TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE TargetOrganizations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), industry VARCHAR(255), employee_count INT);
CREATE TABLE SocialEngineeringReports (id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, method VARCHAR(255), success BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE ExploitationAttempts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, target_organization_id INT, date DATE, success BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE Contacts (id INT PRIMARY KEY, social_engineer_id INT, target_organization_id INT, role VARCHAR(255), contact_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Organization (
    org_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    employees_count INT,
    headquarters_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    emp_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    emp_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    dept_id INT REFERENCES Department(dept_id),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
